text:
e="preserve">Hamish McLachlan (27 July 1967 – 21 December 2020) was an Australian rower. He competed at the rowing event at the 1988 Summer Olympics, finishing fifth. He later worked in the stock market in Australia.
In 2004, McLachlan went to jail for nine years for stock market fraud.
McLachlan died on 21 December 2020 at the age of 53.
